Bicycle accessory: The watch can be attached to a bicycle as a simple and unconventional bike bell or bike alarm.
Reminder wrist clip: The watch strap can be used as a reminder bracelet to mark an important date or appointment, making it visible even when checking phone notifications.
Wrist light: A small LED light can be attached to the watch strap to provide a hands-free wrist light for those who don't have a watch with a built-in light.
Wrist temperature monitor: A thermistor can be attached to the watch to measure the wearer's body temperature, providing real-time feedback.
Fashion accessory: Wristwatch bands can be used as key chains, hair clips, or small ornaments for a unique piece of fashion statement.
